index
Class GenerateIndex

java.lang.Object
  index.GenerateIndex

public class GenerateIndex
extends java.lang.Object

This class generates an InvertedIndex data structure based on some collection of documents To figure out where the documents are delimited, we have a constant called DOC_DELIM defined

Author:
aduric
